Articles.Content:
Who else here calls the cannon on dres "The Scar"?

are there any other names it's called?

It doesn't really have a name.

I think it's named like Kerbol... it's official name is "The Sun".

There's not really any other names to call it in my opinion. I suppose you could call it a trench, but trenches are underwater. I don't really call it anything myself, just labeling it as a strange terrain feature. I do however hope we get some more crazy terrain like this in the future though.

There's a CANNON on Dres? Wow must be where that huge CANYON came from, like in Robotech/Macross :-P

I have a crew there now. Possibly one of the best places in the solar system to watch a Kerbal tumble down a cliff. Jeb has his own term for it, but I'll let someone else go there first lol.
